alert.note: Alert for Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Upper Gila River Valley (New Mexico) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS El Paso (Southern New Mexico and extreme Western Texas)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 30 at 3:51PM MDT by NWS El Paso
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Grant County through 415 PM MDT... At 351 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 8 miles east of Mule Creek, moving southwest at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Mule Creek. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Southern Gila Highlands, Black Range; Upper Gila River Valley
